column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////EDIT: Bavette's reached out to me the week I posted the review and offered to respect the lost reservation / help me make another one for a future date. I have made and confirmed a reservation with Bavette's for May. I'll be updating the review once I dine with them. While the hostess responding to my call was a disappointment
column2: I appreciate Matt from Bavette's reaching out.
